ygData.subject: Re: [cantera] very basic question
ygData.msgSnippet: Ron, In that case the best thing to do is just use the binary installer for Windows.  Download and run Cantera154.msi.   This will install everything you need

Ron,

In that case the best thing to do is just use the binary installer fo=
r 
Windows.  Download and run Cantera154.msi.   This will install 
everythi=
ng you need to use Cantera from Python or Matlab.
Then you don't even have =
to have cygwin, or bother with running 
'configure' etc.

But to answer you=
r question - it seems you have an incomplete 
installation of cygwin, or so=
me path problem, if even 'ls' doesn't 
work.

Dave

era for Windows

 directory

s) are. 
> Also, the basic unix command ls doesn't work. I'm know I'm doing=
 
> something very basic incorrectly. Help!
> =A0

> Ron Besser

Ron, 


In that case the best thing to do is just use the binary installer =
for
Windows.  Download and run Cantera154.msi.   This will install
everythi=
ng you need to use Cantera from Python or Matlab.

Then you don't even have=
 to have cygwin, or bother with running
'configure' etc.


But to answer yo=
ur question - it seems you have an incomplete
installation of cygwin, or so=
me path problem, if even 'ls' doesn't
work.


Dave
